random

Class RandomMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • random.RandomMap

  • public class RandomMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Random Map Generator
    Generate an hexagonal matrix with an specified theme, with dimensions side x side and a 'Weather' style.
    Author:
    Vinicius Silva
    See Also:
    World, ui

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomMap

        public RandomMap(Weather style,
         int nPlayer,
         int side,
         java.util.Random rand)
        Default constructor.
        Construct a RandomMap object, accordingly with the theme chosen and the size of the map.
        Parameters:
        style - Weather of the map
        nPlayer - Number of players
        side - Size of the side of the matrix
        See Also:
        Weather

    • Method Detail

        Stores the bases created for this map.
        Returns:

        This method returns a matrix of characters, with debug purposes.
        Returns:
        Matrix of characters representing the entire map.
